mapper.select: select count(*) amount from kj_icbc where month(dt_add)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(dt_add)=year(SYSDATE())

select count(ki.id) amount,sum(iekir.fk_money) money from kj_icbc ki,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.fk_status in(1,2,3) and iekir.`status`=62 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id

select count(ki.id) amount,sum(iekir.fk_money) money from kj_icbc ki,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.fk_status=1 and iekir.`status`=62 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id

select count(ki.kk_loan_stateid) sell,cs.`name` name from kj_icbc ki,comm_states cs where ki.kk_loan_stateid=cs.id and month(ki.dt_add)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(dt_add)=year(SYSDATE()) GROUP BY ki.kk_loan_stateid ORDER BY count(ki.kk_loan_stateid) DESC

select count(ki.gems_fs_id) gems,af.`name` name from kj_icbc ki,assess_fs af where ki.gems_fs_id=af.id and month(ki.dt_add)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(ki.dt_add)=year(SYSDATE()) GROUP BY ki.gems_fs_id ORDER BY count(ki.gems_fs_id) DESC

select count(ki.kk_loan_stateid) sell,cs.`name` name from kj_icbc ki,comm_states cs,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where ki.kk_loan_stateid=cs.id and iekir.icbc_id=ki.id and month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.fk_status in(1,2,3) and iekir.status=62 GROUP BY ki.kk_loan_stateid ORDER BY count(ki.kk_loan_stateid) DESC

select count(ki.gems_fs_id) gems,af.`name` name from kj_icbc ki,assess_fs af,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where ki.gems_fs_id=af.id and month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and iekir.icbc_id=ki.id and ki.fk_status in(1,2,3) and iekir.`status`=62 GROUP BY ki.gems_fs_id ORDER BY count(ki.gems_fs_id) DESC
select year(dt_add) year,month(dt_add) month,count(*) total from kj_icbc where year(SYSDATE())-year(dt_add) < 2 GROUP BY year(dt_add),month(dt_add) ORDER BY dt_add DESC limit 9

select sum(case when iekir.fk_money >= 30000 and iekir.fk_money < 100000 then 1 end) singular1, sum(case when iekir.fk_money >= 100000 and iekir.fk_money < 200000 then 1 end) singular2, sum(case when iekir.fk_money >= 200000 and iekir.fk_money < 500000 then 1 end) singular3, sum(case when iekir.fk_money >= 500000 then 1 end) singular4 from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir,kj_icbc ki where month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and iekir.status = 62 and ki.fk_status in(1,2,3) and iekir.icbc_id=ki.id
select count(zxok_tag) zxok,zxok_tag from kj_icbc GROUP BY zxok_tag ORDER BY zxok_tag

select sum(case when cardage.card >= 18 and cardage.card < 30 then 1 end) age1, sum(case when cardage.card >= 30 and cardage.card < 40 then 1 end) age2, sum(case when cardage.card >= 40 and cardage.card < 50 then 1 end) age3, sum(case when cardage.card >= 50 then 1 end) age4 from (select (year(SYSDATE())-Mid(c_cardno,7,4)) card from kj_icbc) cardage

select sum(case when carage.age >= 1 and carage.age < 3 then 1 end) age1, sum(case when carage.age >= 3 and carage.age < 6 then 1 end) age2, sum(case when carage.age >= 6 and carage.age < 9 then 1 end) age3, sum(case when carage.age >= 9 then 1 end) age4 from (select (year(ki.dt_sub)-year(ac.cardt1)) age from assess_cars ac,kj_icbc ki where ki.id=ac.icbc_id and ac.cars_type=1) carage

select year(yh_date.fk_date) year,month(yh_date.fk_date) month,avg(timestampdiff(day,dz_date.dt_sub,yh_date.fk_date)) adate from (select icbc_id,dt_sub from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result where `status`=52) dz_date, (select icbc_id,fk_date from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result where `status`=62) yh_date where dz_date.icbc_id=yh_date.icbc_id GROUP BY year(yh_date.fk_date),month(yh_date.fk_date) ORDER BY yh_date.fk_date DESC limit 12

select year(dt_sub) year,month(dt_sub) month,count(*) total from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result where status=82 and year(SYSDATE())-year(dt_sub) < 2 GROUP BY year(dt_sub),month(dt_sub) ORDER BY dt_sub DESC limit 9

select year(fk_date) year,month(fk_date) month,count(*) con,(sum(fk_money)/10000) money from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result where icbc_id in(select icbc_id from assess_cars where cars_type=2) and `status`=62 and year(SYSDATE())-year(fk_date) < 2 GROUP BY year(fk_date),month(fk_date) ORDER BY fk_date DESC limit 12

select newcars.year1,newcars.month1,oldcars.oldcon,oldcars.oldmoney,newcars.newcon,newcars.newmoney from (select year(fk_date) year1,month(fk_date) month1,count(*) oldcon,(sum(fk_money)/10000) oldmoney from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result where icbc_id in(select icbc_id from assess_cars where cars_type=2) and `status`=62 and year(SYSDATE())-year(fk_date) < 2 GROUP BY year(fk_date),month(fk_date) ORDER BY fk_date DESC limit 12) oldcars, (select year(fk_date) year1,month(fk_date) month1,count(*) newcon,(sum(fk_money)/10000) newmoney from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result where icbc_id in(select icbc_id from assess_cars where cars_type=1) and `status`=62 and year(SYSDATE())-year(fk_date) < 2 GROUP BY year(fk_date),month(fk_date) ORDER BY fk_date DESC limit 12) newcars where oldcars.year1=newcars.year1 and oldcars.month1=newcars.month1
